title: 82/968/EEC: Commission Decision of 30 December 1982 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Dionex - Ion Chromatograph, model 12' may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 30 December 1982 establishing that the apparatus described as "Dionex - Ion Chromatograph, model 12" may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties (82/968/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "Dionex - Ion Chromatograph, model 12", which is the subject of an application by the Federal Republic of Germany of 19 May 1982, may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 December 1982.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission (1) OJ No L 184, 15.7.1975, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 74, 18.3.1982, p. 4. (3) OJ No L 318, 13.12.1979, p. 32.
